text:
Michael Bell (born July 30, 1938) is an American actor, director and animal-rights activist. He is known for his youthful voice. He has acted in video games and animated series, including "The Transformers", ', "The Houndcats", "Rugrats", "The Smurfs", and "Snorks".
In live-action, he appeared in "Dallas" and "Star Trek".
